languages.text: {n}Еще на суде вы распознали это создание, но сейчас, когда отрава друкари вышла из организма, вы можете мыслить ясно.{/n}
{n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Еще на суде вы распознали это создание, но сейчас, когда отрава друкари вышла из организма, вы можете мыслить ясно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}
{n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}
{n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}
{n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}裁判のとき、もうこいつだとわかっていたな。今はドゥルカリの毒も抜けて、頭もようやくはっきりしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}裁判のとき、もうこいつだとわかっていたな。今はドゥルカリの毒も抜けて、頭もようやくはっきりしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ya reconociste a esta criatura durante el juicio, pero ahora, con el veneno Drukhari purgado de tu organismo, tu mente está despejada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ya reconociste a esta criatura durante el juicio, pero ahora, con el veneno Drukhari purgado de tu organismo, tu mente está despejada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你早在审判期间就认出了这个生物。而现在，黑暗灵族的毒药已经离开了你的身体，你的头脑无比清醒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你早在审判期间就认出了这个生物。而现在，黑暗灵族的毒药已经离开了你的身体，你的头脑无比清醒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hattest diese Kreatur schon während des Prozesses erkannt, aber nun, da dein Körper vom Drukhari-Gift befreit wurde, ist dein Verstand klar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hattest diese Kreatur schon während des Prozesses erkannt, aber nun, da dein Körper vom Drukhari-Gift befreit wurde, ist dein Verstand klar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous aviez déjà reconnu cette créature lors du procès, mais maintenant que votre corps n'est plus soumis au poison drukhari, votre esprit est enfin clair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous aviez déjà reconnu cette créature lors du procès, mais maintenant que votre corps n'est plus soumis au poison drukhari, votre esprit est enfin clair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu yaratığı duruşmada zaten tanımıştın. Şimdiyse Drukhari zehri vücudundan atılmışken zihnin berrak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You had already recognised this creature during the trial, but now, with the Drukhari poison purged from your body, your mind is clear.{/n}
